00039 using namespace std;

00041 //
00042 void 
00043 WriteUInt32_I(OFSTREAM& outstr,uint32_t val)
00044 {
00045   val = htoil(val);
00046         outstr.write((char *)&val,sizeof(val));
00047 }
00048 void
00049 WriteInt32_I(OFSTREAM& outstr,int32_t val)
00050 {
00051   WriteUInt32_I(outstr,(uint32_t)val);
00052 }
00053 //
00054 void 
00055 WriteUInt32_N(OFSTREAM& outstr,uint32_t val)
00056 {
00057   val = htonl(val);
00058         outstr.write((char *)&val,sizeof(val));
00059 }
00060 void
00061 WriteInt32_N(OFSTREAM& outstr,int32_t val)
00062 {
00063   WriteUInt32_N(outstr,(uint32_t)val);
00064 }
00065 
00066 //
00067 void
00068 WriteUInt16_I(OFSTREAM& outstr,uint16_t val)
00069 {
00070   val = htois(val);
00071         outstr.write((char *)&val,sizeof(val));
00072 }
00073 void
00074 WriteInt16_I(OFSTREAM& outstr,int16_t val)
00075 {
00076   WriteUInt16_I(outstr,(uint16_t)val);
00077 }
00078 void
00079 WriteUInt16_N(OFSTREAM& outstr,uint16_t val)
00080 {
00081   val = htons(val);
00082         outstr.write((char *)&val,sizeof(val));
00083 }
00084 void
00085 WriteInt16_N(OFSTREAM& outstr,int16_t val)
00086 {
00087   WriteUInt16_N(outstr,(uint16_t)val);

00102 //
00103 void 
00104 WriteFloat_I(OFSTREAM& outstr,float fval)
00105 {
00106   type_punned pun;
00107   pun.v_float=fval;
00108         WriteUInt32_I(outstr,pun.v_uint32);
00109 }
00110 void 
00111 WriteFloat_N(OFSTREAM& outstr,float fval)
00112 {
00113   type_punned pun;
00114   pun.v_float=fval;
00115         WriteUInt32_N(outstr,pun.v_uint32);
00116 }
00117 
00118 // Customers wanted repeatablity with old
00119 // text files with only had a single digit after the decimal point.
00120 
00121 void
00122 WriteFloatLowPrecision(OFSTREAM& outstr,float fval)
00123 {
00124   fval=(float)((floor((fval+0.05)*10))/10.0);
00125         WriteFloat_I(outstr,fval);
00126 }

00128 //====================
00129 
00130 // normal C strings.
00131 void 
00132 WriteFixedCString(OFSTREAM& outstr,const char* str,size_t outlen)
00133 {
00134   uint32_t slen=(uint32_t)strlen(str);
00135   outstr.write(str,((outlen<slen)?(uint32_t)outlen:slen));
00136   // pad with nulls
00137   for (uint32_t i=slen;i<outlen;i++) {
00138     outstr.put(0);
00139   }
00140 }
00141 
00142 void 
00143 WriteCString(OFSTREAM& outstr,const char* str)
00144 {
00145   uint32_t slen=(uint32_t)strlen(str);
00146         WriteUInt32_I(outstr,slen);
00147   WriteFixedCString(outstr,str,slen);
00148 }
00149 void 
00150 WriteCString(OFSTREAM& outstr,std::string str)
00151 {
00152   WriteCString(outstr,str.c_str());
00153 }
00154 
00155 // C++ strings
00156 
00157 void 
00158 WriteFixedString(OFSTREAM& outstr,const std::string str,size_t outlen)
00159 {
00160   WriteFixedCString(outstr,str.c_str(),outlen);
00161 }
00162 
00163 void
00164 WriteString_I(OFSTREAM& outstr,const std::string str)
00165 {
00166         WriteCString(outstr,str.c_str());
00167 }
00168 
00169 void
00170 WriteString_N(OFSTREAM& outstr,const std::string str)
00171 {
00172         int len = (int) str.length();
00173         WriteInt32_N(outstr, len);
00174         WriteFixedString(outstr, str, len);
00175 }
00176 
00177 // Character Array
00178 void
00179 WriteCharacterArray(OFSTREAM& outstr, char *c, size_t outlen)
00180 {
00181         for (uint32_t i=0; i<outlen; i++) { outstr.put(c[i]); }
00182 }
